content.raw: The homebrew build is failing due to an [old sdformat3 bottle](https://github.com/osrf/homebrew-simulation/issues/122)
content.html: The homebrew build is failing due to an old sdformat3 bottle

content.raw:
Actually, this also doesn't compile due to trying to use the `ProcessEventsAndDraw` function, which isn't present in gazebo6:

~~~
/var/lib/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-ci-pr_any-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/gazebo/test/integration/collada_visualization.cc: In member function ���void ColladaVisualization::MultipleTextureCoordinates()���:
/var/lib/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-ci-pr_any-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/gazebo/test/integration/collada_visualization.cc:46:9: error: ���class ColladaVisualization��� has no member named ���ProcessEventsAndDraw���
   this->ProcessEventsAndDraw(mainWindow);
         ^
/var/lib/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-ci-pr_any-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/gazebo/test/integration/collada_visualization.cc:49:36: error: ���class gazebo::rendering::UserCamera��� has no member named ���ImageData���
   const unsigned char *data = cam->ImageData();
                                    ^
/var/lib/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-ci-pr_any-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/gazebo/test/integration/collada_visualization.cc:50:29: error: ���class gazebo::rendering::UserCamera��� has no member named ���ImageWidth���
   unsigned int width = cam->ImageWidth();
                             ^
/var/lib/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-ci-pr_any-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/gazebo/test/integration/collada_visualization.cc:51:30: error: ���class gazebo::rendering::UserCamera��� has no member named ���ImageHeight���
   unsigned int height = cam->ImageHeight();
                              ^
/var/lib/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-ci-pr_any-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/gazebo/test/integration/collada_visualization.cc:52:29: error: ���class gazebo::rendering::UserCamera��� has no member named ���ImageDepth���
   unsigned int depth = cam->ImageDepth();
                             ^
make[2]: *** [test/integration/CMakeFiles/INTEGRATION_collada_visualization.dir/collada_visualization.cc.o] Error 1
make[1]: *** [test/integration/CMakeFiles/INTEGRATION_collada_visualization.dir/all] Error 2
make[1]: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....
~~~

http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/567/console
